overview: Spoken in Ojibwemowin (the Ojibwe language) and English and created in the seasons of an Ojibwe way of life, Ningo Gikinonwin. Filmed on location along the Gunflint Trail over the course of four seasons, the narrative and sounds and visuals generate several fractured narrative strands that interweave history, memory and land.
title: The Indians of Gunflint Lake
